name: OverDrive (itch) (CrypticR3D)
description:
An endless driving video game, where you drive across multiple locations. The goal is to drive for as long as possible and avoid the obstacles that’ll cut your road trip short, if you crash just start over.

How long can you drive?

●Genre: Endless Driver / Endless runner.

●Rating: PEGI 3+

●Audience: For players that already enjoy endless runners or similar types of games, the PEGI 3+ age rating means the game is playable by all ages

●Platforms: Android, IOS, Nintendo Switch

●Amount Of Players: Single-player, featuring an online leaderboard so you can challenge your friends and see who can travel the furthest. 

●Game Style: F2P ( Free to play ) model

This is a collaborative project by:  

Gameplay - Eoin Matthews

Desert Stage - Erik Wiking

Forest Stage - Charlie Allen

Beach Stage - Lorenzo Phillips

Q&A - David Ling

Audio - Matthew Muhle
